Name: Lab Rags
About the game: Lab Rags is a hilarious 3D puzzle game where your failure is meaningful! Build upon failed attempts to solve an assortment of puzzles. Just like life, you never know that you're moving forwards unless you make mistakes. Our labs follow the same philosophy: Use every unsuccessful attempt to improve yourself and get further. In our workplace, failure is never the end. - Teleport to the art-deco 1920's world of Lab Rags. - Take control of our fancy crash test dummy to navigate these treacherous labs. - Manipulate the properties of your previous frames to overcome dangerous traps.
